name: vscode-event-curator
description: Useful document events for your VSÂ Code extension to consume
author: Claudia Pellegrino

scripts.clean: yarn run -B del build dist lib types
scripts.compile: yarn run -B tsc && yarn run -B esbuild --bundle --external:vscode --outdir=./build/ --platform=node --sourcemap=inline ./lib/event-curator.js
scripts.repatch: git add -- package.json && yarn patch-commit -s "$1" && git checkout -- package.json && yarn clean-install
scripts.upgrade-all: printf >&2 '%s\n\t%s\n' 'Run the following command line manually:' 'yarn set version stable && yarn install && yarn upgrade-packages' && false
scripts.upgrade-packages: yarn up '**' '@types/node@<=16.x' '@types/vscode@=1.75' '@yarnpkg/sdks@<=2.x || ^3.0.0' && yarn up -R '**' && yarn clean-install
scripts.upgrade-yarn-itself: printf >&2 '%s\n\t%s\n' 'Run the following command line manually:' 'yarn set version stable && yarn install && yarn clean-install' && false
